language.phrase: Unique name that will be part of category url. If empty category name will be used instead.
Sorry, your shopping cart is empty!
Here you can finalize your purchase and make the payment. Once payment is completed you'll be instantly able to download purchased items from your user dashboard.
Please login to continue, your cart content will be saved.
Number of columns per row, for product listing

This is absolute path to your files directory For security reasons this fodder should be in non-accessible web directory E.g.: /home/yourusername/filedirectory/ .You can find out your root path from CMS pro System Information page
Here you can manage all your downloadable items. Note : Deleting product will also remove image and file associated with.
Here you can edit your digital product.
Here you can add your digital download
Here you can configure your digital shop.
Here you can manage your shop categories. Categories allow you to group related articles together.

Drag and drop items to change their positions on the tree. Click on a category or subcategory name to access edit options. Click on icon to delete category item. Click on Save Button to save menu positions. Note: Deleting parent category will also delete all children assigned under the same parent.
Here you can update your shop category.
Here you can add new shop category.

Here you can view all your payment transactions. Note: Deleting valid transaction record will also remove download access to purchased product. Click on pending icon to activate transactions, if for example payment received was in offline mode. This action will also send notification email to the original buyer.
Here you can view and download, all your previously purchased products.
You may pay, view and print the invoice online by visiting the following link:
If Yes visitors will be able to download FREE products, without being logged in.
Number of products shown on category page, used for pagination
Number of latest products shown on default page, used for pagination
Default layout for DigiShop landing page. Grid or List view.
Whether or not to enable Like voting feature

You can assign Single/Multiple memberships, to each product. If membership(s) is selected user will need to have matching membership in order to download the product. These items cannot be purchased individualy.
File does not exist. Make sure you specified correct file name.
This file type it's not allowed. Make sure you specified correct file extension.
You must be registered and logged in, to download free file.
Your membership has expired, and it's no longer valid, you need to renew it again.
Illegal access. Your IP: [IP] has been recorded, and administrator has been notified.
Success! Your payment was APPROVED! Please check your email for further instructions.
Success! Your order was RECEIVED Please check your email for further instructions.
You don't have any categories yet...
You don't have any products yet...
You don't have any transactions yet...
Parent category can hold one or more subcategories.
This is the actual file that user will download. Only .zip and.rar files are allowed.
Image that will accompany your product. Only .jpg, and .png files are allowed.
Enter 0.00 for free downloads or price in 0.00 format
There was a problem reaching destination email. Make sure email address is correct.
Unique name that will be part of product url. If empty product title will be used instead.
If Yes, number of items in each category will be shown
Default email template, used for purchase notifications. Note: Do not replace variables between []
Transaction activated. You should resend it now!
You can attach existing gallery to your project item. Make sure at least one gallery is created from Gallery Module
